Master Svein:
In order to upgrade your Spirit, you will need attribute experience points that are obtained by killing elemental monsters.
Elemental monsters can be found everywhere around the world. You can see the monster's attribute when you choose it as a target.
Every hunting zone has monsters of a certain attribute. You should always remember it if you want to grow your Spirit.
Water monsters: Wind XP
Fire monsters: Water XP
Earth monsters: Fire XP
Wind monsters: Earth XP
